channel.title: java on Sinowrt
channel.description: Recent content in java on Sinowrt

item.title: 程序包`javax.rules.admin`不存在的问题
item.description: 0x00 过程 初始化工程的时候报错 package javax.rules.admin 不存在 // 代码这几行全部标红 import javax.rules.admin.LocalRuleExecutionSetProvider; import javax.rules.admin.RuleAdministrator; import javax.rules.admin.RuleExecutionSet; import javax.rules.admin.RuleExecutionSetDeregistrationException; import javax.rules.admin.RuleExecutionSetProvider; import javax.rules.admin.RuleExecutionSetRegisterException; 查了一下是流程引擎相关的包，最终手动下载JSR94的包导入MAVEN仓库后问题解决
